comments.body:
@rahushen after testing `nxos_aaa_server_host` on nxos7K and 9K, it seems that the hosts force the encrypt_type to 7 even providing 0 as encrypt_type, hence the idempotence issue. will you restrict some of these testcases to other versions of NXOS other than 7K and 9K? using `when: platform is search('N5K')`?

Or is there anyway to make the hosts not forcing the encrypt_type?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +75,79 @@      auth_port: 2083
      acct_port: 2084
      encrypt_type: 0
      key: hello
      state: present

comments.body: Will you please add idempotence test like https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/devel/test/integration/targets/nxos_aaa_server_host/tests/common/radius.yaml#L127?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +147,151 @@      that:
        - "result.changed == true"
        - "'key 7' in result.updates[0]"

  - name: "Check Idempotence"
